description: Clarity table for historical information regarding unconfirmed patient statuses.

columns.name: PAT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the patient record for this row. This column is frequently used to link to the PATIENT table.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: UNCNFRM_HX_STAT_C_NAME
columns.description:
Holds the historical information regarding the patient unconfirmed status (EPT 2023).


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Duplicate Review Needed


Identity Verification Needed


Patient Creation in Progress


Flagged as Suspicious

columns.name: UNCNFRM_HX_STAT_SRC_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores whether the patient status from EPT 2043 was added or removed.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Added


Removed


Modified

columns.name: UNCNFRM_HX_WKFW_C_NAME
columns.description:
Holds historical information regarding the unconfirmed patient source workflow in EPT 2044.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


MyChart - On My Way


MyChart - Unverified Proxy Video Visit


Welcome


MyChart - Self-Signup


MyChart - Open Scheduling


MyChart - Symptom Checker


Unconfirmed Identity Activity


Web Service


MyChart - SAML Login


MyChart - Guest Proxy

columns.name: UNCNFRM_HX_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: Historical information regarding the instant the patient unconfirmed status changed.

columns.name: UNCNFRM_HX_CLI_DTTM
columns.description: Historical information regarding the client instant of the patient's unconfirmed status.

columns.name: UNCNFRM_HX_DTTM
columns.description: Historical information regarding the server instant of the patient's unconfirmed status.

columns.name: UNCNFRM_HX_MYPT_ID
columns.description: Holds historical information regarding the patient's unconfirmed status. This item holds the MyChart user linked to the patient's unconfirmed status change.

columns.name: UNCNFRM_HX_USER_ID
columns.description: Holds historical information regarding the patient's unconfirmed status. This item holds the Hyperspace user linked to the patient's unconfirmed status change.

columns.name: UNCNFRM_HX_RSN_C_NAME
columns.description:
Holds historical information regarding the patient's unconfirmed status. This item holds the reason linked to the patient's unconfirmed status change.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Fake Demographics


Identity Theft


No Identification


Patient Not Present


Patient Cannot Communicate


Other
